content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find the apartment quite suitable for your needs. How much are you willing to pay for a monthly rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. I'm looking for a fair price that reflects the value of the apartment. Would you be willing to start at a lower rate, considering it's unfurnished and the current market conditions?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Of course, Max. I understand that you're looking for a good deal. How about we start at €750 per month? I believe that's a reasonable offer for an apartment of this quality in the city center. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: €750 is a bit higher than what I had in mind, considering the unfurnished state of the apartment. Would you be willing to lower the price to €650 per month? I think that would be more in line with what the market can offer.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: €650 is quite a bit lower than I had expected, Max. However, I'm willing to negotiate. How about we meet in the middle at €700 per month? This would be a fair compromise, don't you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: €700 is more acceptable. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. Would you be able to go down to €675? This would be a good starting point for me, and I'd be happy to sign a long-term lease if the price is right.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, I'm glad to hear that you're interested in a long-term lease. €675 is still quite a bit lower than my initial offer, but considering your commitment, I'm willing to agree to that price. The lease term will be one year, with the option to renew at the end of the term. Is that acceptable to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Yes, one year with an option to renew is perfect for me. I'm happy to hear that we can agree on €675 per month. TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
